channel.title: Start Here on Hike the Ministik!
channel.description: Recent content in Start Here on Hike the Ministik!

item.title: Suggested Mobile Apps
item.description:
Here is a list of suggested mobile apps that can load and display the “GPX” routes and waypoints available for each hike on the site.

When choosing a map to load and display, Openstreetmap (OSM) maps are highly recommended because most, if not all, the hiking trails in the Ministik are displayed in Openstreetmap maps. This is very important in a wild area in which it can be easy to lose the trail and get lost.

item.title: The Nature of Ministik Hiking Trails
item.description:
What is Unique about the Ministik?
#

Hiking in the Ministik is unique when compared to other hiking destinations in the area because trails here are largely unmaintained. In the Ministik, nature is almost completely left alone to its “naturing”. Growth and decay slowly alter the character of trails, often obsuring them with overgrowth in the short run and completely reclaiming them in the long run.
